262233.「これは 大魔王 <pc>様。\n ワタクシ しがない作家をしておりマス\n <:
This is the Great Demon King Hello. My name is <%sL_NPC_NAME> and I'm a humble writer... I'm afraid I'm writing your autobiography on your behalf... Yeah... Yes,
well, autobiographies of great men are always interesting... I'd like to ask you a few questions about that. You've only been known
in the Demon Realm for a short time, so compared to the Great Demon Lords of the past, you don't have enough episodes for your
autobiography. So, I want you to do something that will make you famous as the Great Demon King and report it to me! I'll tell you what
to do in the form of a request from me... Of course, if you report back to us, we'll provide you with a small reward for your
coverage...

262234.「どうか お引き受け いただけないでショウか？\n<yesno><break>: Please, will you take care of this for me?<yesno><break>

262235.「さすがは 大魔王となられた お方デス！\n そう言ってくださると 思っていまシ:
I wouldn't expect anything less from the Great Demon Lord herselfhimself! I knew you'd say that.
Here's the current request list you can tackle.

262236.<pipipi_off>\n<pc>は\nエピソード依頼帳（だいじなもの）を\n:
<pipipi_off>
<pc> received
the Episode Request Book (Key Item)!<me 60>

262237.「そうデスか……。\n 気が変わりましたら\n いつでも お声がけくだサイ。:
I see... If you change your mind, please feel
free to let me know.

262238.「これは <pc>様。\n 自叙伝は 鋭意執筆中で ございマス。\n 本日は ど:
If it isn't Lord <pc>. I'm
hard at work creating your autobiography.
What can I do for you today?
<break>

262239.「他に何か ご用件は ございマスか？\n<break>:
Is there anything else I can do for you?
<break>

262240.「おやめになられるのデスね。\n では また ご用がございましたら\n お声がけ:
I see. Well, if you need me again, please
let me know.

262241.「依頼の状況は だいじなものにある\n エピソード依頼帳で 確認できマスので\n:
You can check the status of your requests at
any time by checking the Episode Request Book
in your Key Items.

262242.「おお！ ご報告いただけるのデスね！\n ご報告は まとめてなさいマスか？\n<:
Oh! You have something to report to me? Do
you want to report it all at once?<break>

262243.「フムフム……<wait 500> ナルホド……<wait 500>\n そんな:
Mmm-hmm... I see... You don't say...
Thanks for your report! Your story was marvelous, and I can easily envision your success!
Please accept this as a token of my thanks!

262246.「もちものが いっぱいのようデスね。\n お礼を お渡ししマスので どうぐかばん:
Looks like you're carrying too many things.
Please rearrange your belongings so I can
give you your reward.

262247.「それでは 引き続き\n 依頼のご報告を お待ちしておりマス。\n よろしくお願: I look forward to hearing from you!

262248.「お願いした依頼は\n すべて 達成されたようデスね。\n<bw_break>:
It appears that all of your requests have
been completed.<bw_break>

262249.「さて 申し訳ないのデスが\n 続けて お願いしたい依頼が ございマス。\n お:
Please excuse me, but I have another request.
Will you accept it?
<yesno><break>

262250.「おお！ さすがは大魔王となられた お方デス！\n それでは……\n<bw_br:
I wouldn't expect anything less from the Great
Demon Lord! Now then...<bw_break>

262252.「これだけ エピソードがあれば\n 充分 続きを書くことが できそうデス！\n<:
With this many episodes, I have much more
material to write about!<bw_break>

262253.「書き進めるうちに また 新たなエピソードが\n 必要になると思いマスので\n:
I'll be certain to need more episodes to
write about, so please come back again soon!

262254.「今のところ お願いしている依頼は\n ないようデスね。\n<bw_break>:
There aren't any new requests at the moment.
<bw_break>

262255.「じつは また <pc>様に\n お願いしたい依頼が あるのデスが\n お願いで:
Actually, Lord <pc>, I have a
request I'd like to ask of you.
<yesno><break>

262256.「……達成済みで まだ 報酬を受け取っていない\n 依頼があるようデスね。\n:
...You have requests that have been
fulfilled, but you haven't been rewarded for
yet. Please report them to me first.
<bw_break>

262257.「依頼書を 更新するのデスね。\n 今のリストは 上書きされてしまいマスが\n:
You want to update the request list? If you
do that, the current one will be overwritten.
Is that all right?
<yesno2><break>

262258.「今のところ お願いしたい依頼は\n お渡ししているもので すべてになりマス。\:
So far, the requests we've given you are all we have... New request forms are available every Sunday morning at 6:00 a.m., so please
come back...

262260.「今のところ ご報告いただいたエピソードだけで\n 充分 続きを書くことが でき:
So far, the episodes you've reported are enough for me to continue writing... New request forms will be available every Sunday
morning at 6:00 a.m. Please come back...

262261.「何について ご説明いたしまショウ？\n<break>: What would you like to talk about, Mr. Shaw?<break>

262262.「<pc>様の 自叙伝を 書くために\n 大魔王として ハクがつくような\n エ:
In order to write your autobiography, we'd like you to create an episode that will make you look like a demon king. I'll suggest what
you should do in the form of a request... I will also prepare a small reward for each request that is accomplished... I'm proud to
say that I'm one of the best calligraphers in the world of magic, so please don't worry and leave it to me... I'll make sure to finish
the work to your satisfaction!

262263.「依頼をこなすには まず ワタクシから\n 依頼書を 受け取ってくだサイ。\n<:
To complete a request, you must first receive a written request from me... On the request form, you'll need to fill out five episode
requests... All of the episode requests can be completed at the same time... You may proceed in any order... When you've completed
your requests, please report to me... You can report back to me separately, or you can report all of your requests at once. The more
episodes we get, the better we'll be able to make our work, so please help us out!

262264.「新しい 依頼書があるときは\n 手元のリストを 新しいものに\n 更新すること:
When you have a new requisition, you can update your list with the new one... Even if your current list is still in progress, you
can update it at any time you like. However, please note that any uncompleted requests before the update will be lost. If you have a
request that you have already completed, please report it to us first so we can give you your reward... Also, if you don't have
any new requests you can't update your list... New requests will be ready once a week, every Sunday morning at 6:00 a.m.

262265.「依頼を ご報告いただければ\n 達成した依頼に応じて 報酬をお渡ししマス。\n:
All you have to do is report a request and we'll give you a reward based on the request you complete. Please note that the experience
value of the reward will be given to the occupation when you report it. Of course, if you come to us in training mode, we can give
you training stamps...

263144.<pc>は 報酬の経験値\n<%dL_EXP> Pを 手に入れた！\n<se_n:
<pc> received <%dL_EXP> EXP
as a reward!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

263145.<pc>は 報酬の特訓スタンプ\n<%dL_EXP> 個を 手に入れた！\n<s:
<pc> received <%dL_EXP> Training Stamps
as a reward!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

263146.<pc>は 依頼<%nL_CLEAR_COUNT>件分の 報酬として\n経験値:
<pc> received <%dL_EXP> EXP
as a reward for <%dL_CLEAR_COUNT> cleared requests!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

263147.<pc>は 依頼<%nL_CLEAR_COUNT>件分の 報酬として\n特訓スタ:
<pc> received <%dL_EXP> Training Stamps
as a reward for <%dL_CLEAR_COUNT> cleared requests!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

263149.「胸が躍るような スバらしいご報告を\n お待ちしておりマス！:
I'm looking forward to hearing your exciting
stories!

263192.「どちらの依頼のお話を\n お聞かせいただけマスか？: May I ask which request you're referring to?

263193.「お礼の 経験値は\n 合計 <%nL_EXP> Pになりマスが\n このまま:
The total amount of experience you'll earn is
<%dL_EXP> points. Do you wish to accept it now?
<yesno><break>

263194.「今の職業デスと レベル上限に達しているため\n 経験値は お渡しできまセンが\:
I can't give you my experience because I've
reached the maximum level for my current
occupation, is that okay?<yesno><break>

263195.「お礼の 特訓スタンプは\n 合計 <%nL_EXP> 個になりマスが\n この:
The total amount of training stamps you'll
earn is <%dL_EXP>. Do you wish to accept it now?
<yesno><break>

263196.「今の職業デスと 特訓スタンプが\n 上限に達しているため アイテムのみの\n:
You've reached both the experience and
training stamp limit for this vocation, so
I can only give the item reward. Is that okay?
<yesno><break>

263197.「かしこまりまシタ！\n それでは 早速 お聞かせくだサイ！:
Understood! Now then, please tell me all about
your exploits!

263198.「依頼はまだ 継続中のようデスね。\n 引き続き よろしくお願いいたしマス！:
It seems you still have some ongoing requests.
I appreciate your continued efforts!

268074.<pc>は 依頼<%nL_CLEAR_COUNT>件分の 報酬として\n達人経験:
<pc> received <%dL_EXP> Master Orb EXP
as a reward for <%dL_CLEAR_COUNT> cleared requests!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

268294.「依頼はまだ 継続中のようデスね。\n 引き続き よろしくお願いいたしマス！\n:
It seems you still have some ongoing requests.
I appreciate your continued efforts!<bw_break>

296915.<icon_exc_npc 9002>\n「おっと！ 最後に お伝えすることがあ:
Oh, right! I have one more annoucement. To celebrate the 10th Anniversary, I'll be also offering a special reward.
I'll give you 3 10th Anniversary Lotto Tickets for each completed request, in addition to the normal reward. I hope to see you more often!

296916.「ただ今 １０周年のお祝いとして\n 追加の報酬を お渡ししていマス。\n こち:
To celebrate the 10th Anniversary, I'm now
offering an additional reward. Please take
it!

296923.<pc>は 依頼<%nL_CLEAR_COUNT>件分の 報酬として\n<%sL:
<pc> received <%dL_REWARD_NUM> <%sL_REWARD_ITEM>
as a reward for clearing <%dL_CLEAR_COUNT> requests!
<se_nots System 7>
